snippet: With gun safety measures headed to the Senate, members of the House and Senate appropriations committees made permanent four gun-rights provisions largely favored by Republicans.
abstract: Members of House and Senate appropriations committees, with gun safety measures headed to Senate, make permanent four gun-rights provisions largely favored by Republicans.
lead_paragraph: With gun safety measures headed to the Senate, members of the House and Senate appropriations committees made permanent four gun-rights provisions largely favored by Republicans.

headline.seo: Congressional Committees Make Gun-Rights Provisions Permanent
headline.main: Congressional Committees Make Some Gun-Rights Provisions Permanent
headline.print_headline: Congressional Committees Make Some Gun-Rights Provisions Permanent
